description: Drug-drug interaction watchlist relevant to prescribing cascades in PLHIV

severity_levels.CONTRAINDICATED: Do not use together; risk of severe/fatal adverse event
severity_levels.MAJOR: Potentially life-threatening or requiring major management change
severity_levels.MODERATE: May worsen patient condition; may require dose adjustment or monitoring

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición de CYP3A4 por RTV/COBI → aumento masivo de niveles de estatina → riesgo de rabdomiólisis
interactions.mechanism_en: CYP3A4 inhibition by RTV/COBI → massive increase in statin levels → rhabdomyolysis risk
interactions.consequence_es: Rabdomiólisis, fallo renal agudo, potencialmente fatal
interactions.consequence_en: Rhabdomyolysis, acute kidney failure, potentially fatal
interactions.management_es: Contraindicado. Usar rosuvastatina (dosis máx 10mg), pravastatina o pitavastatina en su lugar.
interactions.management_en: Contraindicated. Use rosuvastatin (max 10mg), pravastatin, or pitavastatin instead.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: IP/r → dislipidemia → estatina. El riesgo crítico es si se prescribe simvastatina/lovastatina.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: PI/r → dyslipidemia → statin. Critical risk if simvastatin/lovastatin is prescribed.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición de CYP3A4 → aumento de niveles de iPDE5 → hipotensión severa, priapismo
interactions.mechanism_en: CYP3A4 inhibition → increased PDE5i levels → severe hypotension, priapism
interactions.management_es: Si necesario, dosis muy reducidas con supervisión: sildenafilo máx 25mg/48h, tadalafilo máx 10mg/72h.
interactions.management_en: If necessary, very reduced doses with supervision: sildenafil max 25mg/48h, tadalafil max 10mg/72h.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: ISRS/antipsicótico → disfunción sexual → iPDE5. Riesgo aumentado si hay IP/r.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: SSRI/antipsychotic → sexual dysfunction → PDE5i. Increased risk with PI/r.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición del transportador OCT2/MATE por DTG/BIC → reducción de eliminación renal de metformina → aumento de niveles de metformina
interactions.mechanism_en: OCT2/MATE transporter inhibition by DTG/BIC → reduced renal metformin elimination → increased metformin levels
interactions.consequence_es: Acidosis láctica por metformina (raro pero grave), hipoglucemia
interactions.consequence_en: Metformin-induced lactic acidosis (rare but serious), hypoglycemia
interactions.management_es: Monitorizar función renal. Considerar reducción de dosis de metformina. Evitar metformina si TFGe <45.
interactions.management_en: Monitor renal function. Consider reducing metformin dose. Avoid metformin if eGFR <45.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: INSTI → ganancia de peso/DM2 → metformina. La combinación requiere vigilancia.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: INSTI → weight gain/T2DM → metformin. Combination requires vigilance.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inducción de CYP3A4/CYP2C9 → reducción de niveles de anticoagulantes → riesgo trombótico o necesidad de ajuste de dosis
interactions.mechanism_en: CYP3A4/CYP2C9 induction → reduced anticoagulant levels → thrombotic risk or need for dose adjustment
interactions.consequence_es: Pérdida de eficacia anticoagulante, riesgo de trombosis. Con warfarina: INR impredecible.
interactions.consequence_en: Loss of anticoagulant efficacy, thrombosis risk. With warfarin: unpredictable INR.
interactions.management_es: Monitorizar INR frecuentemente con warfarina. Con ACODs, considerar alternativas ARV. No hay datos suficientes para muchos ACODs con EFV.
interactions.management_en: Monitor INR frequently with warfarin. With DOACs, consider alternative ARVs. Insufficient data for many DOACs with EFV.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Pueden prescribirse anticoagulantes como parte de una cascada (p.ej., FA inducida por HTA no controlada).
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Anticoagulants may be prescribed as part of a cascade (e.g., AF induced by uncontrolled hypertension).

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición masiva de CYP3A4 → aumento extremo de benzodiacepinas → sedación profunda/coma respiratorio
interactions.mechanism_en: Massive CYP3A4 inhibition → extreme benzodiazepine accumulation → deep sedation/respiratory coma
interactions.management_es: Contraindicado con midazolam/triazolam orales. El midazolam IV puede usarse con monitorización estricta.
interactions.management_en: Contraindicated with oral midazolam/triazolam. IV midazolam may be used with strict monitoring.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: EFV/ARV → insomnio → benzodiacepina. Riesgo crítico si hay IP/r concomitante.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: EFV/ARV → insomnia → benzodiazepine. Critical risk if PI/r concomitant.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición de CYP3A4 y P-gp → aumento de niveles de colchicina → toxicidad grave
interactions.mechanism_en: CYP3A4 and P-gp inhibition → increased colchicine levels → severe toxicity
interactions.consequence_es: Toxicidad por colchicina: miopatía, neuropatía, supresión medular, fallo multiorgánico
interactions.consequence_en: Colchicine toxicity: myopathy, neuropathy, bone marrow suppression, multi-organ failure
interactions.management_es: Reducir significativamente la dosis de colchicina. Considerar alternativas para la gota (AINEs con precaución, corticoides).
interactions.management_en: Significantly reduce colchicine dose. Consider alternatives for gout (NSAIDs with caution, corticosteroids).
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: Tiazida → gota → colchicina. En PVVIH con IP/r, riesgo de toxicidad grave por colchicina.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: Thiazide → gout → colchicine. In PLHIV on PI/r, risk of severe colchicine toxicity.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inducción de CYP2B6/CYP3A4 por EFV → reducción significativa de niveles de metadona → síndrome de abstinencia
interactions.mechanism_en: EFV induction of CYP2B6/CYP3A4 → significant reduction in methadone levels → withdrawal syndrome
interactions.consequence_es: Síndrome de abstinencia a opioides, recaída en adicción
interactions.consequence_en: Opioid withdrawal syndrome, relapse in addiction
interactions.management_es: Monitorizar síntomas de abstinencia; puede requerirse aumento de dosis de metadona de 30-50%.
interactions.management_en: Monitor for withdrawal symptoms; methadone dose increase of 30-50% may be required.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Puede desencadenar cascada: EFV → reducción de niveles de metadona → síntomas de abstinencia → nuevos opioides prescritos.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Can trigger cascade: EFV → reduced methadone levels → withdrawal symptoms → new opioids prescribed.

interactions.mechanism_es: Nefrotoxicidad aditiva/sinérgica → mayor riesgo de disfunción renal aguda
interactions.mechanism_en: Additive/synergistic nephrotoxicity → greater risk of acute renal dysfunction
interactions.consequence_es: Fallo renal agudo, síndrome de Fanconi
interactions.management_es: Evitar AINEs regulares en pacientes con TDF. Si necesarios, usar brevemente y monitorizar función renal.
interactions.management_en: Avoid regular NSAIDs in patients on TDF. If needed, use briefly and monitor renal function.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: TDF + AINE → nefrotoxicidad → medicamentos adicionales. Importante identificar.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: TDF + NSAID → nephrotoxicity → additional medications. Important to identify.

interactions.drug_a: Any QT-prolonging ARV (saquinavir, rilpivirine high-dose, lopinavir/r)
interactions.mechanism_es: Prolongación aditiva del intervalo QT → riesgo de torsades de pointes
interactions.mechanism_en: Additive QT prolongation → torsades de pointes risk
interactions.consequence_es: Torsades de pointes, fibrilación ventricular, muerte súbita
interactions.consequence_en: Torsades de pointes, ventricular fibrillation, sudden death
interactions.management_es: Monitorizar ECG. Evitar combinaciones de múltiples agentes que prolongan QT. Verificar electrolitos.
interactions.management_en: Monitor ECG. Avoid combinations of multiple QT-prolonging agents. Check electrolytes.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada: Antipsicótico (cascada del ISRS) + ARV que prolonga QT = riesgo aditivo.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Cascade: Antipsychotic (from SSRI cascade) + QT-prolonging ARV = additive risk.

interactions.mechanism_es: Inhibición de CYP3A4 por cobicistat → acumulación de corticoide inhalado → síndrome de Cushing iatrogénico
interactions.mechanism_en: Cobicistat CYP3A4 inhibition → inhaled corticosteroid accumulation → iatrogenic Cushing syndrome
interactions.consequence_es: Síndrome de Cushing, supresión suprarrenal, osteoporosis, hiperglucemia, cataratas
interactions.consequence_en: Cushing syndrome, adrenal suppression, osteoporosis, hyperglycemia, cataracts
interactions.management_es: Preferir beclometasona inhalada (menos susceptible a CYP3A4) o valorar cambio de ARV sin cobicistat.
interactions.management_en: Prefer inhaled beclomethasone (less susceptible to CYP3A4) or consider switching to ARV without cobicistat.
interactions.cascade_relevance_es: Cascada doble: Cobicistat + corticoide inhalado → Cushing → hiperglucemia → antidiabético; osteoporosis → bisfosfonato.
interactions.cascade_relevance_en: Double cascade: Cobicistat + inhaled corticosteroid → Cushing → hyperglycemia → antidiabetic; osteoporosis → bisphosphonate.
